ai-patthana22.25:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.25:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of self-developing the internally and externally,
ai-patthana22.25:1.1_0: Not for the sake of efficacy, there is no cause or reason for the sake of others.
ai-patthana22.25:2.1_0: or perhaps I cannot cause them to teach Dhamma for the sake of extensiveness.
ai-patthana22.25:4.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with internal object, for two conditions,
ai-patthana22.25:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.25:6.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the six objects, that is to say, there are two degree of clusters who were reborn in the company of the Thirty-Three ...
